title: I got a notification that I received a gift, but didn't receive anything?
body: I had 2 notifications about me receiving a gift next to the friend list (It showed a chest). They disappeared but I didn't get anything?

replies.body: Hmmmm it doesn't actually look like this account has had any gifts sent to it recently so that might have been some kind of weird visual bug from an earlier gift. It could have also been for the Honor Icons that recently went out, so be sure to check your Summoner Icons!
